alert.note: Alert for Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MAURY AND SOUTHEASTERN WILLIAMSON COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thompson`s Station. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Spring Hill, and Thompson`s Station. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 52 and 66. Interstate 840 between mile markers 24 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
